Posts.Content: My pathology report said I have vascular invasion. I am node negative, ER/PR - and HER/neu -. The tumor was about 1 cm. I am worried about the "vasuclar invasion". What does this mean for my prognosis? I have read a lot of differing opinions on the net. I am meeting with an oncologist next week to get started on chemo and rads, but want to know if anyone out there knows about this. Thanks. "Worried in VA"
Posts.Signature: Age 47, postmeno 9 mm Mixed IDC/ILC Dx 3/21/06 Lumpectomy 5/12/06 Stage 1, ER/PR - , HER/neu - Not sure what treatment yet
Posts.Title: Vascular invasion
